New Records: Canada recorded their first ever win at the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Ireland's poor batting performance leading to a 12-run loss
Canada's highest score of 137/7 on the ground
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland won the toss and opted to bowl first
Canada's bowlers performed well to limit Ireland's top order
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's players and fans celebrated the historic win
Ireland's loss left them needing to improve for subsequent matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium
Canada's victory was their biggest result in history
